hero.tagline: Transforming ideas into exceptional digital experiences

about.title: About
about.description: Passionate Full-Stack developer with expertise in creating modern web and mobile applications. I transform complex concepts into elegant and high-performance digital solutions.

estateUp.title: Founder & Full Stack Developer
estateUp.description: Development of a web application for AI-powered real estate photo enhancement: virtual home staging, blue sky, retouches. Modern stack (React, TypeScript, Django, Stripe, Supabase) with ultra-realistic rendering and a simple user experience in just a few clicks.

arcCycle.title: Founder & Developer
arcCycle.description: Creation of a mobile application with habit tracking, random daily challenges, a motivating gamification system, and advanced statistics to track your progress.

iLoveNice.title: Sales Associate
iLoveNice.description: Customer service in a souvenir shop. Sales management, payments and inventory tracking. Multilingual communication with international customers.

mngrsAi.title: Full Stack Developer
mngrsAi.description: Contribution to the development of an innovative web platform using artificial intelligence to support music artists in their creative process and complete career management.

consultant.title: Consultant / Developer
consultant.description: Versatile consultant working on various projects: software development, web applications, technical solutions and DevOps infrastructure setup for different clients.

freelance.title: Full Stack Freelance Developer
freelance.description: Occasionally alongside my studies, I worked as a freelance developer for various clients, mainly showcase websites and personal e-commerce stores.

gaming.title: Semi-professional Video Game Player
gaming.description: Gaming enthusiast, I participated in hundreds of competitive tournaments across 6 different games from division 2 to division 1, developing skills in strategy, analysis, teamwork, leadership as captain, quick decision-making and adaptation.

arcCycle.description: Arc Cycle is a React Native mobile app designed to help you develop personal discipline through a system of progressive cycles (arcs), daily challenges, and habit tracking.

estateUp.description: Enhance your real estate photos in 3 clicks: virtual home staging, blue sky, retouches... Ultra simple to use and ultra realistic rendering. Showcase your listings in seconds thanks to AI.

linattendu.description: Website for a Loveroom with booking management and automated email system. Designed to simplify space booking, it offers a smooth user experience with real-time notifications and automatic email confirmations.

aquapro.description: Professional website for a plumber in Montpellier, designed to showcase services and facilitate contact. The modern and responsive interface presents various services (plumbing, heating, emergency repairs), contact information and allows customers to easily reach the company for their needs.

streetshop.description: CBD showcase and ordering website for flowers, oils, resins, cosmetics, infusions and e-liquids in Nice. A modern e-commerce platform allowing customers to discover and easily order quality CBD products with a smooth and secure user experience.

bouncingBalls.description: You know those bouncing balls taking over TikTok that make people addicted? Well, I decided to recreate this little phenomenon over a weekend. Result: hours lost watching balls bounce, but at least I coded them myself! Maybe we'll go further... or maybe not, who knows?

learning.title: Learning
learning.description: I love learning: I've tried data analysis, 2D and 3D games, binary trees, sorting algorithms and everything I can get my hands on. Browse my GitHub, even though 90% of my projects are private or licensed, there are still some gems from my beginnings to explore.

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.subtitle: What my clients say about my work

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: What I can do for you

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.description: Modern and high-performance web applications with React, TypeScript and Node.js

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Native iOS and Android apps with Swift and React Native

cloud.title: Cloud & DevOps
cloud.description: Scalable cloud infrastructure with AWS, Vercel and Supabase

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: Elegant and intuitive interfaces with Figma

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's build something extraordinary together
contact.description: I'm available for short or long-term job offers, as well as freelance missions. If you have a project in mind or an opportunity to discuss, don't hesitate to contact me!
